text: Jøvik Chapel (Norwegian: ) is a small church in Troms county, Norway. It belongs to the Church of Norway. It is situated in the village of Jøvik, which is near Kjosen fjord. The chapel is a part of the Ullsfjord parish and is under the Tromsø domprosti (arch-deanery) in the Diocese of Nord-Hålogaland. The building was originally constructed as a school, but the school was closed in 1960. The building was renovated in 1976 to turn it into a chapel that can accommodate about 100 people. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Troms Category:Churches in Norway
title: Jøvik Chapel
